Mining chest
Type: Container

A rock solid variety of items that are related to mining.

Mining chest is an openable treasury item. It can drop while doing Mining activities, and can be obtained from some other sources. These Chests are the only way to obtain some Mining based Equipment. They can have the odds of finding them increased with the Chest Finding equipment attribute.

Loot Tables

These are the sub-tables for the various materials, coins, and items that can come from these chests.

These treasury items take 4 independent loot rolls when they are opened.
